attributes.action: We voted to leave the EU, but we now know we were lied to, so we want a re-run.
attributes.background: The EU campaigners did not have an EU exit plan, hence their winning result has created uncertanity for our pensions, our jobs, life savings. They are masquerading as a political party and stoking up racial hatred, and we shall not stand by and watch them even tearing up the race and equality law.
